title: Minimal Example VLMD
description: This is an minimally filled out template

fields.name: age
fields.description: What is your age? (age at enrollment)

fields.name: hispanic
fields.description: Are you of Hispanic, Latino, or Spanish origin?

fields.name: sex_at_birth
fields.description: The self-reported sex of the participant/subject at birth

fields.name: SU4
fields.description: During the past 30 days how many days did you use heroin (alone or mixed with other drugs)? ] [Write 0 days if no use]

fields.name: pulse_rate
fields.description: Heart rate measured at systemic artery
